vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting RR Regional Retail District and a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned NO(A) Neighborhood Office District, on the southeast corner of Hillcrest Road and LBJ Freeway
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z-25-000085

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
